name: google-maps-documentation
description: In sync, versioned copy of Google Maps API documentation

scripts.start: npm run crawl && npm run push_master
scripts.push_master: git checkout master && rm  docs/*.md && mv html/*.md docs/ && npm run add_script_to_docs && npm run commit_master && git checkout develop
scripts.add_script_to_docs: for f in ./docs/*.md; do echo '<script src="replace_links.js"></script>' >> "$f" ; done
scripts.commit_master: git add --all && git commit -am "docs for `git log --format=%B -n 1 develop | head -1`" && git push -f

author: amenadiel@gmail.com
